name: The Hero of Kildo
description:
HUGE THANKS TO PATRICK DE ARTEAGA FOR HIS MUSIC!

https://patrickdearteaga.com/

NOTE: This game is a very early prototype, and is discontinued. It was intended as a test of the coppercube engine. 

The Hero of Kildo is a glitchy mess of a game, where you try to kill every enemy in the town of Kildo, and can be quite a lot of fun for 5 minutes. This game doesn't take it seriously, and shouldn't be. Thanks for trying it out! =}

Only available until 31/12/2020
